Name: Post-sign Intro Call
Dispo: Post-sign Intro Call of Miss Inaba Junaid Farooqi with GP, Naveed Khalid. This is to welcome Inaba to SaadiCorp, ensure she’s up-to-speed with the employee board, tools, workflows, SOPs, etc. Introduce Inaba to SaadiCorp’s culture, discuss extra-curricular activities, training programmes, etc. Discuss long-term goals, loyalty, and commitment to the firm. Brief for the next week, initial responsibilities and tasks, etc. Discuss benefits, business expense re-takes, perks and privileges, etc. Final notes on the onboarding, ensure every SOP and procedure is in progress and/or complete.
